data_table.description: This data table contains subject IDs, consent group information, subject aliases, and affection status for sporadic autism spectrum disorder (ASD).

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject for sporadic autism spectrum disorders (ASD)
